alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Fannin; Gilmer; Gordon; Lumpkin; Pickens; Union (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 11:56PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Lumpkin, Gilmer, western Dawson, southeastern Gordon, Pickens, Union and eastern Fannin Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1155 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Gumlog to near Black Gap Shelter to Salacoa Valley, and moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Up to 35 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dahlonega, Jasper, Dawsonville, Ellijay, Blue Ridge, Blairsville, Nelson, East Ellijay, Morganton, Talking Rock, Suches, Fairmount, Ranger, Amicalola Falls State Park, Jones Creek, Fausett Lake, Pisgah, Talmadge, Cherry Log and Tate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Dawson; Fannin; Gilmer; Gordon; Lumpkin; Pickens; Union
